revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = New Mauville |image = [[File:New Mauville.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of New Mauville. |tokens = 24,000 |location = South of Mauville City, East of Route 110. }} '''New Mauville''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 260,000 |- | Magneton (Boss) || 850,000 |- | Electrode (Boss) || 850,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Magnemite * Voltorb * Magneton (boss) * Electrode (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
